response.job_title: Wind Energy | Project Management | Renewable energy | Electrical Engineering
response.summary:
Electrical engineer and Project Management specialist with Knowledge in project management under the
PMI guidelines and practices. Experience related with the management of construction (BOP), installation
and commissioning of wind energy projects.
response.skills: Energía eólica, Generación de energía eléctrica, Gestión de proyectos, diseño electrico, Ingeniería, Relaciones públicas, Gestión de eventos, AutoCAD, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Word, Servicio de atención al cliente, comunication, leader, Leadership, Microsoft Project, Trabajo en equipo, Servicio centrado en el cliente, Diseño eléctrico, Ingeniería eléctrica

profile_positions.description:
Wind farms construction management for the projects supplied by Vestas LATAM.

Responsibilities:  planning, contract & risk management, supply of WTGs, transport, erection, tests and commissioning.

Projects:

El Llano IV - 18 WTG (V150) X 4.5 MW (81 MW) - Puerto Madryn, Argentina - Under Construction (Ongoing)
Punta Lima - 13 WTG (V100) X 2.2 MW ( 28.6 MW) - Naguabo, Puerto Rico (USA)
Guzmancito II - 13 WTG (V136) X 3.6MW (46.8 MW) - Puerto Plata, Republica Dominicana
WESP 01 - 4 WTG (V136) X 3.45 MW (13.8 MW) - Guajira, Colombia
GUAJIRA I-  10 WTG (V100) X2 MW (20 MW) - Guajira, Colombia
profile_positions.title: Project Engineer

company.name: EBSA - Empresa de Energía de Boyacá

profile_positions.company: EBSA - Empresa de Energía de Boyacá
profile_positions.description:
- Create and manage connection studies for generation projects using non renewable energy sources with an installed capacity higher than 5 MW.
- Evaluate normative and regulatory impacts in the activities of generation, transmission, distribution and commercialization of electrical energy.
- Carry out technical studies and research necessary to carry out electrical projects for the electrical planning of the system.
profile_positions.title: Planning and Regulation Professional

profile_positions.description:
-Manage the connection of large electrical projects to the company distribution network for Medium Voltage, Low Voltage and Public lighting.
- Technical review of the electrical drawings for Industrial, commercial and residential designs for Medium Voltage, Low Voltage and Public Lighting projects.
- Ensure the compliance of customer needs, Electrical Normative and safety standards, guaranteeing the value chain from the request to the commissioning and closing of the project.
profile_positions.title: Connections Management professional

profile_positions.description:
-Analyze and define connection points to the Company's network electrical distribution system.
-Establish the conditions and requirements for the development of the electrical drawings for Medium Voltage, Low Voltage and Public lightning projects.
profile_positions.title: Junior Electrical Engineer

profile_positions.description:
- Support to the middle office and Risk Management area for the energy Management Department.
- Using of computer modeling software for project evaluation and Risk analysis.
profile_positions.title: Intern

profile_positions.description: Construction´s inspection and documental review to evaluate accomplishment of the Colombian electrical normative RETIE and NTC 2050 for electrical installations.
profile_positions.title: Engineering assistant

education.degree_name: tecnico en instalación de redes electricas domiciliarias

company.name: Vestas
company.description:
Vestas is the energy industry’s global partner on sustainable energy solutions. We design, manufacture, install, and service wind turbines across the globe, and with +154 GW of wind turbines in 87 countries, we have installed more wind power than anyone else.

Through our industry-leading smart data capabilities and +132 GW of wind turbines under service, we use data to interpret, forecast, and exploit wind resources and deliver best-in-class wind power solutions. Together with our customers, Vestas’ more than 29,000 employees are bringing the world sustainable energy solutions to power a bright future.
